Package br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades

Class CadesCounterSigner

java.lang.Object
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.signer.signatureSwitch.SignatureDataWrapperGenerator
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades.AbstractCadesSigner
br.ufsc.labsec.signature.conformanceVerifier.cades.CadesCounterSigner
All Implemented Interfaces:
CounterSigner
public class CadesCounterSigner extends AbstractCadesSigner implements CounterSigner
Esta classe adiciona uma contra-assinatura CAdES a um documento. Estende AbstractCadesSigner e implementa CounterSigner.
